FuncDef:
The slave default command sets the default slot number of the slave control board when the system starts.
The undo slave default command restores the default value.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot number of the slave control board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When both the master and the slave control boards are in position, this command is used to specify the slave control board when the system restarts (such as power on).
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
